name: CFXMLParserContext
desc: Contains version information and function pointers to callbacks used when handling a program-defined context.

items.name: init(version: CFIndex, info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, retain: CFXMLParserRetainCallBack!, release: CFXMLParserReleaseCallBack!, copyDescription: CFXMLParserCopyDescriptionCallBack!)
var copyDescription: CFXMLParserCopyDescriptionCallBack!
items.desc: A copy description callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.

items.name: var info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: An arbitrary program-defined value passed to all the callbacks in this structure and in the CFXMLParserCallBacks structure.

items.name: var release: CFXMLParserReleaseCallBack!
items.desc: A release callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.

items.name: var retain: CFXMLParserRetainCallBack!
items.desc: A retain callback for your program-defined context data. Optional.

items.name: var version: CFIndex
items.desc: Version number of this structure. Must be 0.
